LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.RitualNoOb: The conditions to start the ritual are not met.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.RitualNoSp: No suitable location is available to start the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.WrongTime: It is not within the time range specified by the ritual policy.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.Insufficie: There are not enough participants to start the ritual as per policy.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.WrongMood: The average mood does not meet the requirement of the ritual policy.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.Danger: There is danger present, so the ritual cannot start.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.Nobody: No one is available to participate in the ritual.
LanguageData.DoTheRitualsYourselves.Reason.CantUnknow: The ritual cannot be started for an unknown reason.
